original_title: The Gospel According to Booze, Bullets & Hot Pink Jesus, Act I: The Missionary Man
overview: After a tragic incident gets the eccentric Mister Michaels expelled from the seminary and banned from the priesthood, he sets off on a dark new path. He becomes the Missionary Man, a traveling sinister minister spreading the Gospel with one hand while he robs you blind with the other. But when a mysterious and mesmerising stranger suddenly shows up with an offer too
title: The Gospel According to Booze, Bullets & Hot Pink Jesus, Act I: The Missionary Man
